about_the_game:
Join Jean, the second princess of Elden, as she navigates her kingdom through a time of upheaval and uncovers a sinister conspiracy. Set in Ultiria—a continent of five diverse kingdoms—this story unfolds 30 years after a failed senatorial uprising. Although peace was restored, new threats now loom over Jean’s kingdom.
Struggling with academics but excelling in combat, Jean faces a critical challenge when bandits invade Elden. Accompanied by her elder sister, Crown Princess Justine, Jean embarks on a mission that will lead to unforeseen and far-reaching consequences.



Gameplay and Features:

Chronicles of Ultiria is a traditional strategy RPG that requires you to master a range of characters and strategic elements for victory. Navigate complex grid-based maps, battle enemy forces, and uncover the schemes of the shadowy Ultiran Emperor.

◆ Strategic Use of Magic and Support Abilities
Deploy various magic spells to debuff enemies, enhance your defenses with shields, and use staves for healing or providing buffs to allies. Utilize these abilities to create tactical advantages, strengthen your party, and disrupt your foes’ strategies.

◆ Unleash Powerful Combat Arts
Execute devastating combat arts to gain a crucial edge in battle. Using axes to overpower your enemies or lances to avoid getting counter-attacked, these arts can turn the tide of combat in your favor. Master these techniques to outmaneuver and defeat your enemies.



Key Features:
◆Save at the start of each turn for strategic flexibility.
◆18 meticulously crafted maps with diverse terrains and objectives.
◆26 unique playable characters with personal skills.
◆20 different classes from branching promotion paths.
◆7 distinct weapon types and over 40 unique weapons.
◆Permanent unit death adds gravity to every decision.

Prepare to lead, strategize, and uncover dark secrets in Chronicles of Ultiria. The fate of Elden and beyond rests in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Chronicles of Ultiria is a classic strategy RPG where you command a diverse cast of characters through turn and grid-based battles. Strategize to overcome enemies, traverse dangerous maps, and unravel the dark plots of the Ultiran Emperor.
